sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RANCH a term in current usage among the English-speaking peoples for a large farm, particularly one for cattle or horse-breeding. The word came into use in this application in the western states of North America, and was an adaptation of the Spanish-American rancho, herdsmenâ€™s huts; in Spanish a gathering of people having their meals in common, a mess.
